title: Script font ID, please (photo attached)
content:
I am working on replacing some of the vinyl lettering on the wall in the photo I have attached. I have seen this font before, but I have come up empty in all my efforts to identify it. Even "What The Font" can't identify it. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,  
Rob J

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817235422im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSCN3870_6708.jpg)
author: Rob J in WNY

comments.content:
I found it! Amazone! I knew it looked familiar! I'll leave the post for any who wish to see it.

- Rob J
